main event: Observers reported seeing an object moving on radar and witnessing two classic saucer-type objects climbing to sonic speed near Vejle, Denmark.
interesting points: Radar contact with the object moving from south to east was established,The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes with two observed objects,The observer described one object to be five times the size of a large star in the eastern sky,The object was observed moving at approximately 400 knots, or about 480 miles per hour,The Naval officer who observed the object was a trained observer with a high rank.
sighted object: one object on radar and two classic saucer-type objects
witness description: a retired USAF officer and a naval officer of high rank
